mutants.code:
def minimum_path_cost(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, r, c) = case
        a = list(zip(r, c))
        a.sort()
        s = 1
        cur_line = 0
        cl = 0
        pl = 1
        for (i, j) in a:
            if (i + j) % 2 == 1 and cl == i - j:
                s += i - pl
            else:
                s += abs(cur_line - (i - j) // 2)
            cur_line = (i - j) // 2
            cl = i - j
            pl = i
        results.append(s)
    return results

def minimum_path_cost(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, r, c) = case
        a = list(zip(r, c))
        a.sort()
        s = 0
        cur_line = 0
        cl = 0
        pl = 1
        for (i, j) in a:
            if (i + j) % 2 == 1 and cl == i * j:
                s += i - pl
            else:
                s += abs(cur_line - (i - j) // 2)
            cur_line = (i - j) // 2
            cl = i - j
            pl = i
        results.append(s)
